====Compounds====
{{der-top|Compounds}}

* {{ja-r|扮装|ふんそう}}: {{l|en|makeup}}, {{l|en|disguise}}, {{l|en|costume}}

{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ふん}}, with the addition of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ふん}} {{m|ja|す|tr=su}} for verb [[conjugation]]. {{m|ja|す|tr=su}} eventually evolved into modern {{cog|ja|する|tr=suru}}.

===Pronunciation===
* [[音読み|On'yomi]]
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[ɸɯ̃ᵝɴ]}}

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|ふん|trans=intransitive}}

# to [[dress up]] in a [[disguise]], to [[disguise]] oneself
#: {{ja-usex|老人に'''扮'''して警察を逃げた。|ろうじん に '''ふん'''して けいさつ を にげた。|He '''dressed up''' as / '''disguised himself''' as an old man and escaped from the police.}}
# to put on a [[costume]], to [[play]] a [[role]]
#: {{ja-usex|去年ハムレットに'''扮'''しました。|きょねん ハムレット に '''ふん'''しました。|Last year I '''played''' / '''took the role of''' Hamlet.}}
